detail_desc: Blouse in an airy weave with a round neckline with an opening and concealed button at the back of the neck, and 3/4-length, trumpet sleeves.

Cardigan in fine-knit cotton with a V-neck, buttons down the front and long sleeves with a small frill trim at the cuffs.

Dress in a soft knit containing some wool with a round neckline and long sleeves. Motif with sewn-on sequins at the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Blouse in an airy, patterned weave with a small stand-up collar, V-neck, button placket and chest pocket. Gathered yoke at the back, gathered shoulder seams, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Jumper in a cotton knit with a rounded, woven collar, opening and button at the back of the neck and narrow ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The jumper has a gently rounded longer layer in a cotton weave at the hem.

Padded outdoor trousers in breathable windproof, water-repellent, functional fabric with adjustable hook and loop tabs and elastication at the waist. Zipped front pockets, closed seams, a zip fly and press studs, and reinforced hems with snow flaps. Lined. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Padded outdoor trousers in breathable windproof, water-repellent, functional fabric with adjustable hook and loop tabs and elastication at the waist. Zipped front pockets, closed seams, a zip fly and press studs, and reinforced hems with snow flaps. Lined. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Velour boots with lacing at the front, a zip in one side and a loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles.
Shorter top in soft sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

LOVE STORIES x H&M. Bikini briefs in mesh with overlocked edges, a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and cutaway coverage at the back.

Fitted body in jersey containing glittery threads with long sleeves and a deep neckline at the back with tabs and a concealed hook-and-eye fastening at the back of the neck. Press-studs at the crotch.
Fitted mesh top with long sleeves.
Fitted mesh top with long sleeves.
Fitted mesh top with long sleeves.
Pyjamas in lightweight sweatshirt fabric. Top with a drawstring hood with a wrapover front, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Bottoms with elastication at the top.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and lace-trimmed flounce at the top.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and lace-trimmed flounce at the top.
5-pocket shorts in washed denim with hard-worn details and a splatter print. Button fly and frayed, raw-edge hems. Regular fit.

Waistcoat in washed denim with hard-worn details, a collar, buttons down the front and a text print on the back. Flap chest pockets with a button, side pockets, and an adjustable tab at the sides of the hem.

Biker treggings in stretch twill made from a cotton and viscose blend with a fake fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and decorative seams at the knees. Wide ribbing at the waist for optimum comfort.
Calf-length skirt in a pleated weave with an elasticated waist. Unlined.
Wide trousers in woven fabric with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly and straight, wide legs with creases.

Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with a high paper bag waist with pleats and a detachable tie belt. Zip fly with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners, side pockets and straight-cut legs that taper to the hem.

Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with a high paper bag waist with pleats and a detachable tie belt. Zip fly with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners, side pockets and straight-cut legs that taper to the hem.
Trousers in slightly stretchy, sturdy satin with an elasticated waist, zip and concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Tapered legs with decorative seams and a slit at the hems.
Ankle-length, pull-on trousers in soft twill with elastication at the back of the waist. Loose fit with a fake fly, side pockets, a fake back pocket and tapered legs.
5-pocket trousers in washed stretch twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and slim legs with decorative zips at the top and decorative seams.
Joggers in soft twill with a regular, elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, fake back pockets and tapered legs.
Joggers in soft twill with a regular, elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, fake back pockets and tapered legs.
Short-sleeved dress in soft jersey with a zip at the back, side pockets and a detachable, braided belt with D-rings at the waist. Unlined.
Flock-print tights with an elasticated waist.
5-pocket, slim-fit jeans in stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, and flared hems. The jeans are made partly from organic cotton.

Checked shirt in premium cotton with a cutaway collar and French front. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Padded sleep bag in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder and zip at one side. Jersey lining. The sleep bag is designed for indoor use only.
